description: Update rekognition client to latest version
Update emr client to latest version
Update xray client to latest version
When creating an assume role profile, you can now specify a credential source outside of the config file using the `credential_source` key.
Update shield client to latest version
Update cloudformation client to latest version
When creating an assume role profile, you can now specify another assume role profile as the source. This allows for chaining assume role calls.
Update codebuild client to latest version
Adds support for the process credential provider, allowing users to specify a process to call to get credentials.
Update apigateway client to latest version
Update storagegateway client to latest version
Allow reads of zero on streaming bodies, fixes `#1309 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/1309>`__.
